Text:
I have posted several of your uploads on the forum, see here for instance:  http://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=30394&pid=446389#pid446389

I'd really appreciate if you came and advertised your audio books for us. A simple copy/paste of your description and a link to your torrent will be fine. I'd help you if necessary as you can only post once per day, otherwise it merges the posts. 

See you there, yes? 
You may PM here if you have any question:  http://forum.suprbay.org/private.php?action=send&uid=35294

Thank you and keep up the good work :)

Will do!
And I like the PM link.

To contact FerraBit via PM:
http://forum.suprbay.org/private.php?action=send&uid=77844
